content.raw:
The issue can be reproduced  with this simple example:
~~~cmake
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.5)
project(ExampleProject)

find_package(ignition-cmake0 REQUIRED)
find_package(DL QUIET)
find_package(DL QUIET)
~~~

the error is:
~~~
CMake Error at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/IgnImportTarget.cmake:89 (add_library):
  add_library cannot create imported target "DL::DL" because another target
  with the same name already exists.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/FindDL.cmake:78 (ign_import_target)
  CMakeLists.txt:21 (find_package)
~~~
content.html:
The issue can be reproduced with this simple example:

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.5)
project(ExampleProject)

find_package(ignition-cmake0 REQUIRED)
find_package(DL QUIET)
find_package(DL QUIET)

the error is:

CMake Error at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/IgnImportTarget.cmake:89 (add_library):
  add_library cannot create imported target "DL::DL" because another target
  with the same name already exists.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/FindDL.cmake:78 (ign_import_target)
  CMakeLists.txt:21 (find_package)
